channel.title: Game quick-end mistake
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Survivors were 1 Good King, 3 known prince, 4 known assassin, 5 hunter, 11 mastermind. 5 bled 11 while 3 jailed 4. Next day, 5 announced he had bled 11. 1 accused 5, 3 and 11 voted with. 1 died from hunter strike, 5 died from execution. That left alive 3 (known prince), 4 (known assassin), 11 (mastermind bleeding out at end of night).
Game declared unseen victory.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Should have been BD victory. 3 imprisons 4 and executes, 11 bleeds out, 3 only one standing next day. Or if Prince had no execute left (not sure), should have been stalemate - 11 bleeds out, 3 indefinitely imprisons 4.
#### Comments
Suspect the problem was that 11's bleeding status wasn't taken into account. Just a guess.
